column2:
"You did it! You brought me one! This is a
Batragun booster... It's got more
heating power than I imagined."

"This is way above my expectations.
Thank you for always going along with
my weird and unreasonable requests!"

"Ah, I forgot about your reward!
Yes, here it is. I look forward to
working with you again!"

"やった、持ってきてくれたのね！
これが、バトラガンのブースター……
想像以上の火力がありそう。"

"これなら充分、私の期待以上よ。
本当に、いつもいつも無茶や無理を
聞いてくれてありがとう！"

"あっ、お礼忘れてた！
はい、これをどうぞ。
またよろしくお願いね！"
